text: Nana Opoku Ampomah (born 2 January 1996) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays as a winger in Belgium for Royal Antwerp on loan from German club Fortuna Düsseldorf.https://www.bundesliga.com/en/bundesliga/player/nana- ampomah/profile ==Club career== He is an old student of Presbyterian Senior High School, Tema. He made his debut for Waasland-Beveren in July 2016 against Sporting Charleroi in the Belgian First Division A. == References == Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Ghana international footballers Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Waasland- Beveren players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Fortuna Düsseldorf players Category:Royal Antwerp F.C. players Category:Bundesliga players Category:2. title: Opoku Ampomah
